column4: anyone here using raid controllers with lucid on a 3.0.X kernel ? I have 3 PERCs , 1 integrated and two H800 pci ... for some reason with 3.0 the H200 devices are now seen last
do  they show up in the RAID card's BIOS?
the h200 (integrated) used to be sda and sdb ... now they come as sdcm and sdcn after the 90 drives from the jbods are mounted
the drives show up just fine ... it's just that how the kernel decided to re-order everything
